sentence.Network_en: She revealed her feelings in impetuous displays of spending.
sentence.Network_cn: 她冲动地任意挥霍显露了她的感情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... impetus n 动力，冲动 impetuous a 冲动的 perpetuate v 使永久，不朽.
浮字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 浮云〖 floatingclouds〗 浮躁〖 volatile;impetuous〗 浮肿〖 dropsy;edema〗.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... imperil 危及,使陷于危机 impetuous 冲动,猛烈的 impetus 原动力,冲力,刺激.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... unctuous 油腔滑调的 impetuous 冲动的，鲁莽的 tumultuous 乱哄哄的，喧哗的.

list.abs: How to hold existing development impetus and economic position ?, 如何保持现有的发展势头和经济地位?
Character... ... 大材小用[ assign talented people for trivial tasks] 感情用事[ act impetuously] 光合作用[ photosynthesis].
propeller hub 推进器毂propeller impetus 螺旋桨推进propeller in nozzle 导管推进器
impetuosity 急躁impetuous type 不可遏止型impetus 冲动

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French impetueux, from late Latin impetuosus, from impetere 'to assail, attack'

entry.def: If you describe someone as impetuous, you mean that they are likely to act quickly and suddenly without thinking or being careful.

example.ex: He tended to react in a heated and impetuous way.
example.tran: 他往往反应过火,急躁冲动。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by undue haste and lack of thought or deliberation;

sentences.sentence: "liable to such impulsive acts as hugging strangers"
"an impetuous display of spending and gambling"

auth_sentence.content: Strength to resist the most impetuous winds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Strength to resist the most impetuous winds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Strength to resist the most impetuous winds.

auth_sentence.content: Impetuous swipes of paint harry the fleeing hunter towards his doom.
auth_sentence.res_content: Impetuous swipes of paint harry the fleeing hunter towards his doom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Impetuous swipes of paint harry the fleeing hunter towards his doom.

auth_sentence.content: But that certainly wasn't the first impetuous thing I've done.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that certainly wasn't the first impetuous thing I've done.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that certainly wasn't the first impetuous thing I've done.

stems_affixes.word_buile: centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有能力的,能胜任的;足够的
竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compete[v.比赛,竞争]+itive……的→adj.竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
per全部永久+pet追求,寻求+ual……的→追求永久的
pet追求,寻求+ulant多……的→追求太多,导致脾气不好
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ous……的→在[别人]前面追到→幸运的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 食欲,胃口;欲望,性欲;爱好,趣味
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+pet追求,寻求+ite表名词→一再追求→有胃口
appet=appetite胃口+izer东西→n.开胃食品,开胃物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力,胜任某种工作的资格
stems_affixes.word_buile: competent[[adj.有能力的,能胜任的;足够的]]省鷑.能力,胜任某种工作的资格
compete[v.比赛,竞争]+ition表名词→n.竞争, 竞赛
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
petition[n.请愿书,申请书 v.[向…]请愿,正式请求]+er人→n.请愿人
per全部,永久+pet追求,寻求+uate=ate表动词→追求永久
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ate表动词→追到前面去→获宠爱
